name: Resurgence (itch) (Ao)
description:
A short narrative game created during the Emotional Game Jam 2023 in Laval. 

Resurgence was created by Lidia LOUBELO and Emma CASABONNE-MASOUNAVE, in 48 hours with the themes "Fragile" and "Poker move". (Team TWICE)

Through the eyes and mind of a young woman, you'll be able to explore three different environments and be the witness of their fragility and how easy it is to destroy them.

Will you keep closing your eyes to those environmental issues or will you try to pull a last move to make things change ?
